posts.post_title: would take a very stong 4- 4.5 or 50, etc....

posts.post_content: Dan, have this PSA5 (see scans), nice card, deep color, clean, good centering.  Wasn't going to sell, just got it, but I now have two.  If interested, I'd sell off current VCP average.  If not, no worries - thanks, Ed
